\begin{question}
 What is the difference between the \verb|begin| and \verb|cbegin| functions?
\end{question}

\begin{question}
What are the types of the following four objects?
\begin{lstlisting}
vector<int> v1;
const vector<int> v2;
auto it1 = v1.begin(), it2 = v2.begin();
auto it3 = v1.cbegin(), it4 = v2.cbegin();
\end{lstlisting}
\end{question}
